full_summary:
** PROCUREMENT NOTICE PROFESSIONAL AUDIT SUPPORT SERVICES (PASS) REQUIREMENT **

The Government of Canada, represented by Transport Canada, invites bids for the provision of Professional Audit Support Services (PASS) for a comprehensive annual assessment and quarterly progress reports of Canadian North's financial and operational data. The objective of this requirement is to assess Canadian North's compliance with the terms and conditions of the amended and restated Confidential Implementation and Monitoring Agreement with the Government of Canada.

** Background Information **

This requirement is open exclusively to Supply Arrangement (SA) holders who have qualified under PASS, specifically those invited under Workstream 5 - External Audit. The following SA holders have been invited to submit a proposal:

- BDO Canada LLP
- Collins Barrow Ottawa
- Deloitte LLP
- Ernst & Young LLP
- KPMG LLP
- MNP LLP
- PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP
- Raymond Chabot Grant Thornton Consulting Inc.
- Samson & Accociés CPA/Consultation Inc.
- Welch & Company

** Contract Period and File Information **

The proposed contract period shall be from the date of contract award to June 30, 2026. The contract file number is T8080-230109.

** Service Requirements **

The contractor will provide professional audit support services, including:

- Conducting quarterly progress reports
- Completing a comprehensive annual assessment of Canadian North's financial and operational data

** Trade Agreements **

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

- World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
- Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
- Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
- Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
- Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
- Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
- North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)

** Contracting Entity Information **

The contracting entity is Transport Canada, with contact information as follows:

- Name: Natasha Blackstein
- Email: natasha.blackstein@tc.gc.ca
- Phone: (343) 550-2321

Note: The deadline for submission of proposals is 14:00 on August 21, 2023.
